name: slre
description: *-less, unrecursive, simple & safe regular expressions for linguistics, usable by non-regex savvy users. SLRE are such as `{We are|I am} [very|quite] glad to {write|offer} {simple [regular ]expressions|SLRE}[ at last].`
releasenote: initial release (gamma). tests pass but still lacks match() (you would use _expand() for the time being)
